remarks: Triviality of singleton powers: set equipollence.  (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 24-Jan-2015.)
statement:
pwssnf1o.y $e |- Y = ( R ^s { I } ) $.
pwssnf1o.b $e |- B = ( Base ` R ) $.
pwssnf1o.f $e |- F = ( x e. B |-> ( { I } X. { x } ) ) $.
pwssnf1o.c $e |- C = ( Base ` Y ) $.
pwssnf1o $p |- ( ( R e. V /\ I e. W ) -> F : B -1-1-onto-> C ) $.
$d B x $.
$d C x $.
$d I x $.
$d R x $.
$d W x $.
$d Y x $.
